title: Help us shape our movement!
excerpt: At GetUp, our power isn’t just in our campaigns—it’s in you. Every action, every donation, every volunteer hour fuels a movement that belongs to all of us. Together, we’ve built something extraordinary, and now, as we embark on our next chapter of growth, we need your voice
description: At GetUp, our power isn’t just in our campaigns—it’s in you. Every action, every donation, every volunteer hour fuels a movement that belongs to all of us. Together, we’ve built something extraordinary, and now, as we embark on our next chapter of growth, we need your voice more than ever.  We’re inviting you to help shape what comes next. This is your movement, and your vision will guide it. Take our member survey today and let’s dream, build, and fight for the future we want—together!
